Events that occurred on 6 February

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1968 - The second day of filming J.R.R. Tolkien for the documentary Tolkien in Oxford.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Vera Chapman and the Tolkien Society.
1978 - William Sievert publishes the article "A Mania for Middle-earth" in the Chronicle for Higher Education.
1995 - Voice actor Frank Duncan dies.
2008 - Artist John Alvin dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
Uglúk and his troop search northern Rohan for the Fellowship.
